# VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName

**Structure**

The joint group names for an animal body pose.

## Declaration

```swift
struct JointsGroupName
```

## Getting the Group Names

- **all**: A group name that represents all joints.
- **forelegs**: A group name that represents the forelegs.
- **head**: A group name that represents the head.
- **hindlegs**: A group name that represents the hindlegs.
- **tail**: A group name that represents the tail.
- **trunk**: A group name that represents the trunk.

## Creating a Group Name

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a joint name with the key you specify.

## Accessing Points

- **availableJointNames**: The names of the available joints in the observation.
- **VNAnimalBodyPoseObservation.JointName**: The joint names for an animal body pose.
- **availableJointGroupNames**: The available joint group names in the observation.
- **recognizedPoint(_:)**: Returns the point for a joint name the observation recognizes.
- **recognizedPoints(_:)**: Returns the points for a joint group name the observation recognizes.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
